title: Idly | Steamed Idly with Idly Rava | Soft Idly | Southeast Asian Cake 👌
content:
Breakfast recipe: Idly  Servings : 45 Idlis   Duration: 10 mins  Hot steamed idly smeared with desi ghee is India's Healthiest breakfast recipe originated from south India 🇮🇳   You can also call it 'Southeast Asian Cake' To make idly you need only two ingredients, skinless black gram and finely broken rice we call it Idly rava or you can also use parboiled rice instead of idly rava. These ingredients are easily accessible in any Indian grocery store. Soak them in water, make batter, ferment and make idly by using idly cooker Idly's can make in 10 minutes if you're ready with batter and also healthy breakfast because black gram contains minerals and protein, you can serve it with coconut chutney/ Idly Podi/ Sambar 😋. For chutney and Podi recipes, check links down below (procedure section) Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Idly Rava - Fine - 560 gms
  • Urad Dal ( Skinless Black gram ) - 160 gms
  • Salt - 2 1/2 tsp
  • Baking soda - 1/2 tsp
  • Ghee/ clarified butter - 1 tb sp - melted ( to smear idly moulds )
Procedure:
  • Wash twice & Soak Urad Dal 5-6 hours in water
  • Take idly Rava in a large bowl, add water and rinse twice and strain water
  • Next add fresh water(500 ml) in idly Rava. Let it absorb water (rest 15 mins)
  • Next blend urad Dal into fine paste and transfer to idly Rava bowl
  • Mix well and cover with lid
  • Let it ferment for 10-12 hrs (or overnight )
  • Next day morning, add salt and baking soda in idly batter
  • Mix well and grease idly plates with ghee
  • Pour idly batter in each mould
  • Add 1 cup of water in Idly cooker, put Idly stand in it  & cook 10 mins
  • Steamed Idly's are ready to serve
  • Serve Idly with any of the following chutney links:
  • Coriander Coconut chutney
  • Tomato 🍅 Chutney’s – 3 Ways
  • Idly/ Dosa podi / Powder 😋 
  • Happy cooking 👩🏻‍🍳 & enjoy your day ☀️
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Sometimes batter won't ferment during winter/ too cold at home. So add baking soda in Idly batter at night and it works out well. This tip applies to Dosa Batter also
  • One more suggestion keep Idly batter bowl in warm place such as in oven / microwave.. so there are chances to ferment well
  • I always keep it in oven
